experiences.title: Founder & Lead Software Engineer - Local Venue Discovery App/Service
descriptions: Initiated, designed, and currently developing a full-stack mobile/web app connecting users to local bars and restaurants, leveraging React Native, ReactJS, Node.js, and Supabase for cross-platform functionality and real-time data syncing.

Led recruitment, onboarding, and management of a small multidisciplinary team, fostering agile development practices while contributing hands-on to backend API development, frontend UI/UX design, and cloud database architecture.
Negotiating partnerships with data providers and businesses, integrating external APIs and driving product adoption through direct user/client outreach and feature tailoring.

experiences.title: Lead Programming Instructor - Midtown Metro Achievement Center
descriptions: Designed a 2-month curriculum and delivered discussions, demonstrations, and activities to over 60 students on programming topics such as encryption, authentication, and networking.
Showcased C and Python programs like password-guessing and binary translators.
Mentored over 20 student projects, guiding development and managing multiple concurrent project lifecycles.

experiences.title: Course Assistant - University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
descriptions: Led weekly discussions for 15-20 students on Java concepts including inheritance, encapsulation, and polymorphism.
Supported full-stack application final project design.
Provided over 8 hours per week of tutoring and individually mentored new teaching assistants to onboard and maintain instructional quality.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern - Buzzpay LLC
descriptions: Designed a user interface for chip & PIN card input using C++ and the Arduino IDE. Built backend logic to process input and display outputs via LED display hardware.
Regularly communicated milestones to project managers and incorporated feedback throughout the development cycle for final deliverables.
